title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the comprehensive requirements for the blockchain supply chain system, including stakeholder needs, system constraints, desired features, integration with existing systems, data privacy and security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, and regulatory compliance.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the blockchain supply chain system, including the blockchain network, smart contracts, and integration with existing systems.

title: Develop Blockchain Network
description: Implement the blockchain network, including node setup, consensus mechanism, and network management.

title: Implement Smart Contracts
description: Develop and deploy smart contracts for tracking product origins, transactions, and supply chain events.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the blockchain supply chain system, including data visualization and reporting.

title: Integrate with Existing Systems
description: Integrate the blockchain supply chain system with existing supply chain management systems, ERP systems, and other relevant systems.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the blockchain supply chain system by implementing appropriate security measures, such as access controls, data encryption, and auditing.

title: Develop Testing Strategy
description: Define a comprehensive testing strategy for the blockchain supply chain system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the blockchain supply chain system.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation for the blockchain supply chain system, including architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
